commit message: Smarter handling of non-JSON response from the server

MyAccount refactoring completed. New interfaces created to decouple the
type from other types which use the Account's persistence.
Message list loading made always asynchronous
Fixed message context menu after addition of Follow/Stop following.

TimelineTypeEnum members renamed, 'Following' timeline added into the
definition (but not seen yet)

TimelineDownloader class split into three classes in order to separate
responsibilities.

1. Fixed incompatibility with API 10.
2. Improved 'Loading' list footer.

Fixed: Downloading all messages from each timeline (not only since last
downloaded)
